title: Vincentiana
text: Vincentiana is the sixth <a href="symphony">symphony</a> by the Finnish composer <a href="Einojuhani%20Rautavaara">Einojuhani Rautavaara</a>. In 1986–1987, Rautavaara wrote the <a href="opera">opera</a> "<a href="Vincent%20%28opera%29">Vincent</a>" based on several events in the life of painter <a href="Vincent%20van%20Gogh">Vincent van Gogh</a>; many of the <a href="Theme%20%28music%29">themes</a> of that opera became the basis of "Vincentiana".
